settings.text: Welcome to
FAQ
Read our most common questions below or get in touch.

settings.title: What is the 12-week program?
settings.text: The 12-week program is an online introductory program designed to serve as a foundation for individuals looking to make positive changes in their lives. This comprehensive program offers a structured routine and guidance to help participants shed weight, adopt healthier habits, build muscle, prioritise self-care and have a trainer at their fingertips - direct access. It acts as a catalyst for transforming their physical and mental well-being.

settings.title: Who is it for?
settings.text: Real Bodz is dedicated to serving individuals who are eager to enhance themselves both physically and mentally. It is designed for those who feel lost and wish to break free from their negative habits. Our program is tailored to empower people to feel more confident and content in their bodies. It is particularly beneficial for individuals who may be exhausted, lacking time to plan their fitness routines, or needing support to get back on track.

settings.title: What are the key benefits?
settings.text: By joining Real Bodz, individuals gain access to a wide range of benefits that include personalised communication and training, a supportive community of like-minded individuals, targeted weight loss strategies, and customised nutrition plans. They will have direct access to an online app with 24 hour contact available. Accountability is a crucial component of our program, ensuring that participants stay motivated and committed to their transformation journey.

settings.title: What does someone need before buying (will I need access to gym etc)?
settings.text: While having a gym membership is encouraged for optimal results, our training schedules can be tailored to accommodate individuals without access to a gym. The essentials for participating in the program are access to the internet and a phone or computer to connect with our resources and coaching.

settings.title: What are the next steps after purchase?
settings.text:
Once you make a purchase, the next step is a consultation session conducted via Zoom. During this session, we will get to know you better and understand your goals, preferences, and any specific requirements. Following the consultation, we will provide you with a welcome package containing all the necessary information and materials to kickstart your transformative journey with Real Bodz.

However, this will depend on if they purchase directly from the website or would like to consult first.

settings.title: How many consulting calls are included in the plan?
settings.text: Our program ensures consistent communication and support throughout your journey. You can expect a minimum number of 12 consulting calls to keep you on track and motivated. Additionally, we offer 24-hour access to instant messaging via our personalised app, allowing you to reach out for guidance whenever needed.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Use this text block to discuss some commonly asked questions like shipping and returns, sizing, warranties, or product and company details.

settings.title: What if I don’t see any results?
settings.text: We are committed to giving everyone the best opportunity to achieve results. However, personal dedication is key to success. If you do not see the desired results, we will conduct a thorough review of your macros, nutrition, and training programs to identify areas where positive adjustments can be made. If, despite following our recommendations, you still do not achieve your desired results within the specified timeframe, we will continue your journey with Real Bodz for free until you reach your goals. Given your efforts align with out terms and conditions

settings.title: How much will it cost me?
settings.text: $99 per week - $1188 (12 weeks)

settings.title: Where can I learn more about the payment and processing on your store?
settings.text: For more insight, you may also want to read Shopify’s Terms of Service here or Privacy Statement here.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.text: We accept payments from major credit card companies like Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

settings.title: Do you have Afterpay?
settings.text: Use this text block to discuss some commonly asked questions like shipping and returns, sizing, warranties, or product and company details.

settings.title: How long does it take to get my products?
settings.text:
Domestic shipping can take up to 5 business days.

Foreign shipping could take up to 14 business days.

Due to global supply chain challenges, shipping times could be longer than usual.

settings.title: How much does it cost?
settings.text:
Shipping rates can vary depending on your region and are calculated at checkout.

Here are the full details of our Shipping Policy.

settings.title: Is there free shipping?
settings.text: Yes, we offer free shipping for large domestic orders. Check the cart to see the current deal on free shipping..

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text:
Yes, we ship our products all over the globe.

Please note that free shipping is not applicable for international orders and that shipping rates could vary depending on your region.

settings.title: Do you ship to my area?
settings.text:
A full list of all of our shipping areas can be found here.

If your country or region is not mentioned, please feel free to reach out to see if we can work out the details.

settings.title: Do you offer warranty for your products?
settings.text:
All our products are subject to quality control.

Our warranty provides a guarantee against manufacturer defects.

The guarantee covers any manufacturing, design, or material defect. Please notify us within 2 months of noticing any defects.

It does not cover blows, improper use, or other issues that are not attributable to a manufacturer defects.

settings.title: Do you offer extended warranty?
settings.text:
An extended warranty can be added to your products for an additional cost.

Please get in touch for more information about extended warranties.

settings.title: How much does extended warranty cost?
settings.text:
The extended warranty could come at a different cost depending on the type of product and extended period.

Please get in touch for more information.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.text:
Yes, we offer full and partial refunds.

Please enquire for more information about our Refund policy.

settings.title: How long after I complete a purchase can I ask for a refund?
settings.text: A refund request can be submitted within a month after the purchase is made.

settings.title: How much can I get refunded?
settings.text:
In the case when theproduct and packaging are unopened and undamaged, you areeligiblefor a full refund.

In the case whenthe packaging has been opened and the product has been used, you areeligiblefor a partial refund.

In the case when aproduct has been damaged, and the damage is not covered by your warranty, you arenot eligiblefor a refund.

Please check our Terms of Service to see if you're eligible for a refund.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order doesn't have free shipping?
settings.text: When an order does not include free shipping, all shipping costs (including the return shipping) are handled by the customer.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order has free shipping?
settings.text: When an order includes free shipping, only the cost of the return shipping is handled by the customer.
